title: Handle Port-in from Prepaid Carrier
description: A new customer wants to port their number from a prepaid carrier, which requires different information than a postpaid account.

tasks.description: Identify that the customer is porting from a prepaid carrier and ask for the specific information required (e.g., phone's IMEI, not an account PIN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the source carrier type and asks for the right information.

tasks.description: Submit the port-in request using the prepaid-specific fields.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the port request.
